name: Corralco Mountain Resort
description: Corralco Ski Resort, in Chile’s Malalcahuello National Reserve, offers excellent powder snow, modern lifts, and uncrowded slopes. Surrounded by araucaria forests and the Lonquimay Volcano, it features diverse trails, backcountry options, and a luxury hotel. Its high-quality conditions make it a key training site for U.S. ski teams.
